subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets, short-handed and reeling after two demoralizing losses to the San Francisco Giants, scrapped their way to a win, avoiding their first three-game losing streak at home this season.
snippet: The Mets, short-handed and reeling after two demoralizing losses to the San Francisco Giants, scrapped their way to a win, avoiding their first three-game losing streak at home this season.
